snippet: The arrest of LulzSec's vocal ringleader is likely to put a chill on the hacktivist movement, according to an author who writes about Anonymous. Would-be Anonymous hackers may think twice before they participate in an attack, for fear they will be...
abstract: The arrest of LulzSec's vocal ringleader is likely to put a chill on the hacktivist movement, according to an author who writes about Anonymous. Would-be Anonymous hackers may think twice before they participate in an attack, for fear they will be exposed.

headline.main: What Do the LulzSec Arrests Mean for Anonymous?
